_doc: Frozen AnalystConfig for TMT analyst (internet + software focus). Aggressive filtering for <5 page briefing.

tickers._doc: Coverage universe. Primary = daily attention, Watchlist = opportunistic.

ticker_priority._doc: Tier routing: high = Tier 1 eligible, medium = Tier 2/3 only.

trusted_analysts._doc: DEPRECATED: Now uses portal's Followed Notifications. Analysts you follow in the portal ARE your trusted analysts. This field kept for reference only.
trusted_analysts._note: Follow analysts directly in each portal (Jefferies, etc.) - the scraper will pull from your followed list automatically.

themes._doc: Investment themes. Priority: critical > high > medium. Keywords drive classifier boost.

sources._doc: Source credibility: 0.0-1.0. Higher = more trusted. Used in relevance scoring.

topic_weights._doc: Topic relevance: 0.0-1.0. AI/infra > consumer internet per spec.

content_type_weights._doc: Weight by content type. Facts and forecasts > interpretation.

novelty_weights._doc: Novelty filter. Rehash = 0.2 (below threshold, filtered out).

polarity_weights._doc: Polarity: positive/negative equally important, neutral less actionable.

filtering._doc: Aggressive filtering to enforce <5 page / <15 min constraint.
filtering._doc_relevance_threshold: Chunks below this score are dropped. 0.7 = fairly aggressive.
filtering._doc_minimum_novelty_threshold: Hard filter: anything below (e.g., rehash=0.2) is dropped.
filtering._doc_briefing_days: Only process reports from last N days.

tier_caps._doc: Explicit output caps per tier. Total ~20-25 items for <5 pages.
tier_caps._doc_tier1: Tier 1 = Direct impacts (rating changes, price targets, key catalysts). Keep tight.
tier_caps._doc_tier3: Tier 3 = Reference index (drill-down only, not in main briefing). Can be larger.
tier_caps._doc_total_claim_cap: Hard cap on total claims before tier routing. Target 20-30 range.

scoring_weights._doc: Relevance score = weighted sum of factors. Must sum to 1.0.
